name: Modular
description:
Has your computer ever had a virus?

Don't you just wish you could just blast them out of existence?

Well, now you can!

In Modular, your computer has become infected by the Infinivirus; An infinitely replicating computer virus.

The only way to battle this virus, is by using Modular Antivirus Software, which allows you to traverse the files, and take out the viruses in First Person using the powerful Mod Rifle.

Features:

  • First-Person Shooter
  • Infinite waves of enemies
  • Infinite map layouts
  • Infinite ammo
  • Random boss waves
  • Weapon Upgrades

NOTE (12-22-16)

The full version is finally here! Thank you to everyone that pre-ordered and supported development of this game!
